verses.text: 'Iki Yawé niukieya kanihikitini, Kuheri hetsia munua Petuheri nu'aya.
Teiteri 'ukirawetsixi 'iki xekeneu'eni, Yemeki xekeneu'enana, yunaiti teiteri 'iki kwieyaritsie xemititei. ¿Heiwamieme 'ipai kapitiiyi xeme xe'u'uwakaku yatini meripaiti kiekatari memu'uwakaitsie?
'Ikiki yuniwema xeketeniwarutaxatia, mikita yuniwema mepitewataxatiani, yaxeikiata miki memitewataxatianiki xetutsima.

'Utsikari 'ameminene tita memite'utatexi 'utsikari yakimeminene naime mekaniutikwani, meta 'utsikari yakimeminene tita memite'uhayewaxi 'utsikari 'etsimemipepe naime mekateniutikwani, 'utsikari 'etsimemipepe tita memite'uhayewakai 'utsikari kwimemipepe mekateniutikwani.
Xemitariwe, xekenanutaneniereni xekeneutitsuanani. Yemeki xekeneuti'aiwani xemiyuyetua, winutsie matsi kaxie winuyari makaka xekaniunawaiyarieni xemi'iekaiki.
Xewiti kiekari mitirikaiye memikayu'iniatsinia mekaniu'axiani nekwietsie: Miki mayetsi wahepai mekateniutameni, maye 'uka tameteya 'emititi hepai.
Naime mepite'ukakimixi kaxie xawari, piní mepukamuraxi. Mamateya naime meputimetseriyaxi, naime mepukakarauxi 'ikaya meta xawari.
Neteiterima meputitsuana 'uka 'iimari heiwerika 'iwiyari manahiwa hepai mitiwitinikekai 'umiku hetsiemieme.
Hatsite mawariyari meta kaxie winuyari mitiyeuriwakai, mikiri Yawé tukieyata pikareyetuiwa. Mawari wewiwamete mepuyuheiwerie, Yawé hetsiemieme te'uximayatamete.
Naiti 'ikwaxi miraku'etsitiretsie, pika'ukaxuxuawereri naitiri kwie kaniuwakini, hatsiteri naiti katineuyeweni, kaxie winuyariri mihekwa kaniukawani meta hatseiti kaniuxiniri naiti.
Xemetatsiere xeke'utiwani, te'uximayatamete, xekeneutitsuanani meta te'etsamete, xemite'ekai tsewara xemiteheuyehiaki, naititsiari miraku'etsitire katineuyeweni.

Kaxie naiti kaniutiyinare, piní kaniutawani, meta tiriku mitiuka'etsiwakai 'ikwaxi manitsana hepai mi'anene kaniutiyinare, taki meta manitsana, naiti kiyexite 'itsita mireuka'u. Yaxeikia teiteri watemawierika kaniutiyinare.

Xeme mawari wewiwamete, heiwerika kamixayari xekenanakatikini xe'utitsuati. Xekeneyuheiwerieka, mawari taiyame te'uximayatamete. 'Ena xekenakini, xeme Kakaiyari hetsia te'uximayatamete, tikariki hiwerika kamixayari xekenanakatikini, hatsite mawariyari meta kaxie winuyari mika'atiariwaniki Kakaiyari kiitana mitiuta'imaritixiki.

Xekeneyuhakieka xeyuyetuati, xekenewa'inieka teiteri memayuxeirietsie. 'Ixaheritsixi teiteriyari 'ukirawetsixi xekeniwaxeirieka Yawé xekakaiyari kiita, yunaime teiteri kiekari mitama xekeniwarukuxeiri, meta Yawé xekeneutahiawi.
Xia'ui 'iya tukaritsie, Yawé tukarieya maye'aximeki. Miki tukaritsie naime Naimekimitirikaiye.
Ta'ikwai kataniunawairieni tame tenenierekaku, katinika'unamiki te'utinaweti meta ketemiteyutemamawiekai takakaiyari tukieyata mieme.
'Imiari kaniutipine muka'etsiekai. 'Imiari muwati'utsiwatsie puyexi meta naiti puti'unixi kiiyari mitiuka'etsiekai mireuyeweki.
Tewaxi yemeki meputitsuana. Hau'erieti mepeu'uwa wakaitsixi hakewatsi metehetikwani katiniumaweni, yaxeikia muxatsi mekateniuka'eniwani.
'Eki, Yawé, ne nepimetsiwawirie, 'ixatsi 'ayeparitsie meuka'ukai taiki mutitai, tai 'amanutitetereki naime katiniutitaiya kiyexite 'itsita mireuka'ukai.
Tewaxi yeutari mepimetsikuwautiwe meteheuyehiati, wahaa 'akiitsie naitsarie mukawaxiaki tai 'ixa mutitaiyaxiki 'ayeparitsie.

Kerutsaremetsie kuxineta xekeneutahitsiwani, nehiri mipatsie hetsie xekeneutihiwani mi'enieriekaki. Yunaiti teiteri kwiepa xemitama xekenemamaka, 'aritsiari Yawé tukarieya 'ukanamieni kaniyuritini kanehuraniri.

Yiriya tukariyari kanaye'amiki, hai tukariyari miyiyixawi kanaye'amiki. Hekiariya kemitiyuhekia kahekiaririmeti kwiepa, mipai katinimakatsiukini kiekari mimariwe mitirikaiye, meripaiti hatsuaku kemikatiiyi, nuiwarite 'umemahu wahetsiemiemeri hatsuaku yapikatiyini.

Mexiyukukuyamete meka'aye'axiawawe 'iya tai kaniwatixitsitiwani, kepauka mipai miraye'ani tai pitititaiya naime. Mexixi kahaye'awe kiekari 'Ereni haraweriyari witsimiraku'ane hepai pitiyuxexeiya, kepauka mipai mitiyini yeuta makumawe payani. Tirikariyaya hepaitsita pikatitawikweni.
Kawayutsixi wahepai mepiteyuxexeiya, tixaiti kawayutsixi meha'ati meheuyukwiyuka wahepai mepite'unanauts

Kepauka hiri 'emutititsie memeutatsukwaka, kaxetatsixi yukukuyamete wayuarika hepai pitiyu'eniiriiki, xatsi taipa taiyarieti mutatsipiarika hepai. Kuyaxi memitirikawi 'aixia memiteheku'u meyutakwinike mipai mepiteyuhekia.
Teiteri marikaki meputiyiyiaka, yunaiti mepunututuixietika.
Mepaye'axia memeuyutakwiwawe wahepai, wapaiti mepeutimake kuyaxi wahepai. Yuxexuiti mepuhu 'aixia meteheuku'uti kememiteyu'uitiakai.
Yuhetsie mepika'uyexiriwe, heitserie mepuhu yuxexuiti. 'Iritsata mekaniuhuni meka'anuyutaxiriwati.
Kiekaritsie mekanitahakeni, kuraru heima mepeukamake, kiitetsie mepitimake, 'etsimeuyeyeutsie mepeuhake awayamete wahepai.
'Iki kuyaxi wahixie kwie naiti puyuane meta muyuawi pukuyuane, tau meta metseri piyirixiani, meta xurawetsixi mepitehayewa mehekiariwieti.

Yawé niukieya kanekutirarikani yukuyaxima wahixie, mepikayu'iniatsinia kuyaximama mepitirikawi niukieyatsie yamemitekahu. Yawé tukarieya waikawa kanimariweni kanimakaxiwani. Xewiti pikayiwe mitinewirieniki.
Yawé mipai kanaineni: «Meriki, memitehayewaki yunaiti yu'iyariki nehetsia xekeneu'axia, xe'utitsuati, xeyuheiwerieti xekatekwati».
Yu'iyaritsie xekeneuyukatsanani yukamixatsie pikatixai. Yawé yukakaiyari hetsia xekeneu'axia, miki pitiuyukanenimaya pikahayu'eriya, naki'eriyaki pihine kwitiwa pika'uyeha'ariwe,

piyuwairiya naime mireuyehiwirieniki meta pikarakwinitiani. Heiwati Kakaiyari 'aixia mitinixe'uxei kemitiku'eriwakai minipataxi, 'aixia miti'ane mitatiniuhayewi. 'Imikieri hatsite miki meta kaxie winuyari mitiyeuriwa Yawé xekakaiyari hetsia katinimiemetini.
Kerutsaremetsie kuxineta xekeneutahitsiwani, xeketeniwarukaxatia memiyuhakieniki, xekeniwaruta'ini yunaime 'axeikia.

Kiekatari xekeniwarukuxeiri, xekenepatsieka xeyuxeirieti 'ukirawetsixi mana kiekatari xekeniwarukuxeiri, 'etsimemupepe meta xekeniwarukuxeiri meta tiiri memitsitsewetika. Kewayeyani hekwameki mutineikixi, meta 'uka mihekwawikie kewayeyani yukiita.

Xekeneutitsuanani te'uximayatamete mawari wewiwamete Yawé hetsia miemete, tuki miranutahakitire hixie meta mawari taiyame hixie xeti'uti, mipai xe'utiyuati: «Yawé 'ateiterima ketiniwareuyehiwirieka. Pepikatatsiyetuayani 'axatemika'itiarieniki kapa nuiwarite tahetsiemieme 'ame'utiyuaniki. Hipati mipai memika'utiyuaneniki teiteri: ¿Hakewa xekakaiyari peyeika?»
Merikitsi Yawé matsiikime kanayeitiani kemitinaki'eriekai yukwie hetsiemieme, katiniwareuyehiwirieni yuteiterima.

Yawé mipai katiniwaruta'eiya: <<Neuxei nepitixeyetuirieni, hatsite, kaxie winuyari mihekwa meta hatseiti, waikawa nepixetihuxaitiani 'aixia xeteyukuhiaweme nepixehayewa. Nepikaxeyetuani tawari hipame kiekarite wahetsia xeminanaimarieniki.

Nepikawapitiani 'utsikari xeyeta 'amemayehu, kwie makumawetsie meta makuwakitsie nepiwareukini'ani: Haramara Mimikitsie nepiwakayunitiani wakuyaxi memanuyetei, wa'utimata memuhu Haramara Meritexaniyatsie. Wakaxari pitipine waikawa pitiukuri'iaka».
Nekiekari pepikamaka, matsi kene'atemawieka kene'uxipieka, matsi Yawé waikawa mariweme katiniyuriemiki.
Tewaxi xepikamamaka 'itsita xemu'uwa, 'ixa mumawekaitsie pitiyira, pitixuawere naiti 'iteirite yutakariri mitikwaiwa pitixuawitiani, piní meta kaxie waikawa pitixuawere.

Xekeneyutemamawieka Tsiyuni türiyamama, temawierika xekenexeiyani Yawé yukakaiyari hetsiemieme, kepauka maye'ani wiyeri pukuyuitiani tukarieyatsie. Wiyeri pixehani'airieni xekaka'ewawekaku meta xeka'itsanayu, meripaiti manukatiatsie kemitiyurienekai hepai.
Mirati'uritiretsie tiriku waikawa pitixuawere, kaxie mahinarietsie winu mihekwa waikawa puxuaweni meta hatseiti.
<<Ne nepitixekihiwirieni kepaimexia wiyari xemiteheuyehia naime, 'iya kuyaxi memiyumiire tekimemete waheki kenemitiwareni'a xehetsia: 'ameminene, meta yakimeminene, 'etsimemipepe meta kwimemipepe.
Xeme waikawa xepite'utikwa'ani, kexemiteheukwaiki, Yawé yukakaiyari hetsiemieme 'aixia xeputiyuaneni, xehetsiemieme 'aixia kemitiyurieni. Tawariri hatsuaku neteiterima nepikawatewiyatsitiani.
Merikite 'ana mipai mekatenetimaikuni kename ne Yawé xekakaiyari nehiki, xewiti tawari 'apika'uyeika kakaiyarititi ne'aurie. Tawari hatsuaku neteiterima mepikatewiyatsitiarieni.
>>'Arike mipai tiyiyu, ne'iyari nepitatuani yunaime teiteri wahetsie. Xeme xeniwema 'ukitsi 'ukari mepitetaxata, 'ukirawetsixi mepiteheinini temarita mepitexeiyatsitiarieni.
Miki tukaritsie ne'iyari nepitatuani 'ukitsi meta 'ukari te'uximayatamete wahetsie.
Miyuawitsie meta kwiepa 'iniari nepitiyurieni: xuriya, tai, meta kitsi 'e'utitime.
Tau yiwiti kanayeimiki metserita xuriyapai 'aneti kanayeimiki mexi Yawé tukarieya kahaye'aweni, kepauka mariwemeki mitiyurienitsie.

Yunaiti Yawé memahiawe kemitimariwe yutukari mekanitawikweitsitiakuni, hiritsie xeikia Tsiyuni meta Kerutsaremetsie, piyiweni muyuta'una, Yawé kemitiwarutahuawekai. Memayeneniere wahamatia xeikia mepu'uwani Yawé miwaruta'ini.
'Iya tukaritsie, kemitika'iniaritsie maye'aniki, kepauka ne Kura 'aixia nemiwayurieni meta Kerutsareme newahekwariyati,

yunaime nuiwarite nekaniwakuxeiriemiki Kutsapati mayeweritsie nekaniwakani'amiki. Mana nekaneutahamiki nemitiwakwinitianiki neteiterima 'Ixaheritsixi wahetsiemieme, 'ateewa nuiwarite watsata memiwareutaweiyaxiaki meta nekwie memuyutaxitekiexiaki.
Neteiterima mepuyuta'iwiri mitinakeniki, türi mepuwarupataxi memiyuwitinia waheki, 'ukari tuminiki meta memititariweniki, 'ukari türixi winuki mepuwarutua.

>>Merikite, Tiru meta Tsiruni, meta naitsarie mitiuyehane Piritsiteu kwieyari hetsie, ¿ketita kuta xetehayexeiya nehetsiemieme? ¿Xenetekihiwirienike xeteyu'erie? Xika mipai 'aneni, nematsi kwiti yanepitiyurieni xehetsie mitinakeniki kexeminetsiyuriku,
xemetsi nehuru meta nepirata xekaniunawani, yutukita paiti xekatenetini piinite waikawa nemireuyehiwa.
Xeme kiriyekutsixi wahetsia neteiterima xekaniwarutuani Kura meta Kerutsareme memitama yukwiepa memika'u'uwaniki.
>>>Matsi mipai xeketenemaika, ne nepuwarayewitini tsepa hakewa paiti memetuiyakai, ne yanepitiyurieni 'axakexemite'uyuri xehetsie mitinakeniki.
Xeniwema 'ukitsi 'ukari Kura kiekariyaritsie nepiwatuani, mikita yaxeikia tsaweutsixi wahetsia mekaniwatuakuni nuiwarite 'ateewa kiekatari wahetsia». Yawé mipai kaniutayini.
Nuiwarite mipai xeketeniwarutaxatia: Xekeneyuha'aritiaka xemiyutakwiniki. Kuyaxi xekeniwaxeirieka. Xekeneyuha'aritiaka yunaiti 'ukitsi kuyaxa miemete xemuyutakwiniki.
Hatsaruni yu'ixipara xekenayeitia meta huxa tiriku xikame tepia 'amitewi xekenayeitia. Kemi'ane meumaka mipai ke'utayini: <<Ne nepika'ukama».
Xeiya xekeneyumexiitiaka, nuiwarite xemitama ta'aurie, mana xekeneyuxeirieka mayeweritsie. Yawé, keniwarani'a memayu'eririya 'ahetsia miemete.
<<Nuiwarite xekeneyukuxeiri, xekenehu Kutsapati muyeweri paiti, mana nekananukayerimiki teiteri 'auriena kiekatari nemitiwakwinitianiki.
Keneukaxitekiri, tiriku 'aixia mi'anene kanihikitini. Kaxie xekeneutiketsina, matiketsinariwatsie pihipine. Kaxie xariyariri panakayeuriwe: puwaikawari 'axakememiteyurie».
Mekaniyimiireni memiyixeirie Mayeweri maye'atiarienitsie. 'Ari Yawé tukarieya kanehuraniri Mayeweri maye'atiarienitsie.
Tau meta metseri kaniyirixiakuni, xurawetsixi mepikahekiariwieniri.

Yawé puyutahaxiatiani Tsiyunitsie paiti, Kerutsareme paiti kani'enieriemiki, tiranarieya kwie meta muyuawi kanitayuamiki. Matsi Yawé kemi'ane memiteiterimama 'ixaheritsixi piwatirikariya. piwa'awietani,

«Merikitsi xeme mipai xekatenetimaikuni, ne Yawé xekakaiyari, Tsiyuni nemukaki neyemuri mipatsietsie. Kerutsareme mipatsie kanayeimiki, tawari 'ateewa kiekatari wairiyarika mepikawatahaxiani mexenawairienike.

>>'Iya tukaritsie kaxie winuyari makaka hiritsie panexiani, yemuritetsie retsi puhapaneni. Haa puwayenexiani 'akite manuyehapanetsie kura kwieyaritsie. Yawé tukieyata haixa pitineikani, 'Akatsiya kiyeyari pihatuiyani mayeweritsie miye'u.
'Ekipitu naime nepirakumaweriya, 'Erumi makumawe nepayeitiani, 'axamemiwaruyuriki Kura kwieyaritsie kiekatari, wakwiepa waxuriya memutayeuriki 'atsimekateyuriekame.
Kura kwieyaritsie meta Kerutsaremetsie kiepa payani yuheyemeki, yunaime nuiwari 'umemahu wahetsiemieme.
¿Kamitsi netiwareuyehiwirieni xuriya memutayeuri? Matsi hawaiki nepikatiwareuyehiwirieni». Yawé Tsiyunitsie 'ukaiti kanayeimiki.
